author: gerceboss2109
content: I am looking to research more about light client data fetching over p2p networks and DAS,PeerDAS recently

author: gerceboss2109
content: Can someone please provide me some materials to research and understand these topics in depth?

author: adityagupta1010
content:
https://github.com/1010adigupta/ethereum-research-resources/blob/main/README.md
these articles will give all needed overview of current works, you can deep dive in into references of each article for further deeper info
